definition: to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)

sentences.english: So I put a small camera over there, that acts as a digital eye.
sentences.chinese: 所以我加了一个小摄影机，当作数位眼睛。

sentences.english: This image is then projected on the film of a streak camera .
sentences.chinese: 这个影象被投射到一个扫描摄影机的胶片上。

sentences.english: My father also kept telling them to hide the cameras.
sentences.chinese: 因此，父亲也一再告诫他们要把摄影机藏好。

sentences.english: TVG: You went through most of your pregnancy on camera.
sentences.chinese: 你在怀孕期间几乎都在摄影机前？

sentences.english: The camera moved in on the hero for a closeup sequence.
sentences.chinese: 摄影机向男主角移近，准备拍一组特写镜头。

sentences.english: Siku relied on his much smaller video camera — the one in his mobile phone — to get the images.
sentences.chinese: 西库利用移动电话上的小型摄影机摄取图像。

sentences.english: You can't do much other than control the camera and change from day to night but the graphics are certainly impressive -- much better than the Wii could manage.
sentences.chinese: 整个过程中只能控制摄影机的角度以及日夜变化。

sentences.english: Film day shortly, her cinematograph was reaved by thief soon.
sentences.chinese: 拍摄日子在即，她的摄影机眼看就被小偷抢走了。

sentences.english: Oversee the introduction of additional red-light and speed enforcement camera systems.
sentences.chinese: 监督加设冲红灯及超速摄影机系统的计划。

sentences.english: On the camp of the campus the campaign champion put the camera on the camel.
sentences.chinese: 在校园的营地上活动冠军将摄影机放在骆驼上。

sentences.english: There's often someone with a squeaky toy standing behind the camera.
sentences.chinese: 比如常有人拎着一只吱嘎响的娃娃站在摄影机后。

sentences.english: A wild baby snow leopard has been caught on camera.
sentences.chinese: 山地摄影机抓拍到一只野生幼年雪豹的影像。

sentences.english: Out of the box the ONE does not included Speed and Red-light cameras.
sentences.chinese: 出于对票房的一个不包括速度和冲红灯摄影机。

sentences.english: Satellites are lik spaceships. Satellites carry cameras.
sentences.chinese: 卫星就像宇宙飞船，它们都带有摄影机。
胆怯的影星不敢正对摄影机。

sentences.english: The camera he's holding is his Arriflex.
sentences.chinese: 他手里的摄影机是他的“阿莱弗莱克斯”。

definition: camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
to document on film the course of events/to follow sb with a camera
